mapper.select: SELECT P.PRO_ID , P.PRO_NAME , P.PRO_COLOR , P.PRO_SIZE , P.PRO_PRICE , O.ORDER_EA , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_PHONE , U.USER_ADDR FROM USER_TABLE U JOIN PAYMENT PAY ON(PAY.USER_ID = U.USER_ID) JOIN ORDERDETAIL O ON(O.PAY_ID = PAY.PAY_ID) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(P.PRO_ID = O.PRO_ID)
